summary: A Spanish coming of age story focusing on the antics of two 17 year olds, who have a posh beach house almost all to themselves one summer. This is also a summer of sexual awakenings.
cast: Fernando Ramallo|Jordi Vilches|Marieta Orozco|Esther Nubiola|Chisco Amado|Ana Gracia|Myriam Mézières|Muntsa Alcañiz|Mingo Ràfols|Pau Durà|Eduardo González|Gaelle Poulavec|Jesús Garay|Eloi Yebra|Jordi Sánchez|Mònica Glaenzel|Joel Joan
title: Krámpack
